Rarity: Rare
Looking for Inventory Management? Please Login w/ "Remember Me?" option selected.
Special Powers
TEAM UP: BISHOP, CALLISTO, EMMA FROST, ICEMAN, KITTY PRYDE, KATE PRYDE, PYRO: If 1+ listed friendly characters are on the map, Storm and listed friendly characters gain and modify speed +2 if they occupy water terrain. If 4+ are on the map, during your turns printed hindering terrain is water terrain instead. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.

I think the true benefit is that, with enough qualifying characters, printed hindering terrain becomes a type of terrain that they can ignore for both movement and line-of-fire (when it matters most). It is possible at 300 points, and trivial at 400.
